title: ‘We Have to Be Careful with Him’: Visma-Lease a Bike Banking on Wout van Aert to Return to Form
content:
Belgian star Wout van Aert stymied after first three days of Giro d’Italia: ‘I didn’t want to push my body too far.’

Read the full article at ‘We Have to Be Careful with Him’: Visma-Lease a Bike Banking on Wout van Aert to Return to Form on Velo.
author: sstokes
